name: Andy Zeigert
body:
# UI/UX design
I work for GeoEngineers, an earth science and technology company out of their Bend, Oregon, office. I am part of a team that develops applications for data management for both internal use and outside clients.

Until early 2015 I was a data journalist. I created maps and charts and other visual journalism for both print and web editions. A [a portfolio of my news work](http://newspagedesigner.org/profile/AndyZ) still lives at NewsPageDesigner.org. 

## News design examples
- A [full broadsheet infographic](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/290833/zeigert_site/map1_Page_1.jpg) about the development of Oregon's state and county boundaries.
- A [hand-illustrated infographic](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/290833/zeigert_site/PBabyBones-g1%20081114.pdf) about baby bones that I researched.
- Another [hand-illustrated infographic](http://newspagedesigner.org/photo/delayed-muscle-soreness) about delayed-onset muscle soreness.
- An [interactive dashboard](http://www.bendbulletin.com/business/centraloregonbusinessindex/) for the Central Oregon Business Index.
- An [interactive graphic](https://public.tableausoftware.com/views/OregonBreweries2/OregonBeer?:embed=y&:toolbar=no&:display_count=no&:showVizHome=no#2) about beer production in Oregon.

# Cartography and GIS
I'm a [certified GIS analyst](http://www.cocc.edu/geographic-information-systems/) and a proponent of open-source mapping technologies.

## Some examples of GIS and web cartography
- An interactive map showing [fire perimeters in Oregon for 2014](http://imagehosting.bendbulletin.com/maps/firemap/). Created using leaflet.
- An interactive map showing [designated Wilderness Areas in Oregon](http://imagehosting.bendbulletin.com/maps/wilderness/). Also created using leaflet.
- A [three-part series](http://www.bendbulletin.com/home/2185650-151/storm-king-fire-fatal-in-four-hours?storyType=fullPageHTML) looking back at the Storm King Mountain tragedy. I created the maps that accompany the story and helped develop the layout, which is a slight break from the standard template for the site.

# Freelance graphic design
I also do freelance graphic design work. I'm quite fond of making maps and book covers but also have created some logos and websites. I do freelance design and other marketing work with my business partner, Adam Sears, under the name Apostrophe S Design. Contact us at [apostrophesdesign@gmail.com](mailto:apostrophesdesign@gmail.com) or me directly at [ajzeigert@gmail.com](mailto:ajzeigert@gmail.com) to talk about what we can do for you.

## Some of my freelance work
- Designed and coded a [website for Spectrum Editing](http://spectrumediting.com/).
- Created [a logo](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/290833/zeigert_site/birdies.jpg) and menu for Birdies Cafe in Bend.
- Created [book covers for local Bend author Duncan McGeary](http://www.amazon.com/Led-Slaughter-Donner-Party-Werewolves-ebook/dp/B00IJQR190/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1412314820&sr=8-1&keywords=duncan+mcgeary) and [his wife Linda McGeary](http://www.amazon.com/Telling-Tree-Linda-McGeary-ebook/dp/B00HCZ66FY/ref=sr_1_2?ie=UTF8&qid=1412314876&sr=8-2&keywords=linda+mcgeary), and created a [hand-drawn map](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/290833/zeigert_site/FinalMap.png) for Linda's second novel.

# Comics criticism
As a hobby, I like to write about comics. I've even made a couple bad ones. You can find some of my articles at [Comic Book Daily](http://www.comicbookdaily.com/author/azeigert).

# None of the above
Well, it's good that you're here. I can be found on a few social media sites. My twitter handle is [@zeigert](http://twitter.com/zeigert). My instagram handle is also [@zeigert](http://instagram.com/zeigert). I have [an account at The Old Reader](http://theoldreader.com/profile/ajzeigert) and use it almost every day. You might find me on a few other social media sites, such as [tumblr](http://zeigert.tumblr.com) and [flickr](https://www.flickr.com/people/andyz), but the ones above are the only ones I keep up with regularly. I also volunteer with Big Brothers Big Sisters and CASA.

# Mini curriculum vitae
Attended **Ball State University** from 2001 to 2005, earning a Bachelor of Arts degree in Journalism with an emphasis in Journalism Graphics.
Attended **Central Oregon Community** College from 2013 to 2014, earning a certificate in Geographic Information Systems.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
